el:comments.el:code: API 2 conversion by Andreas in September 2025

el:protected.el:luamain:
-- GENERAL -- wo["ConserveLevel"] = false wo["ProvideExtralifes"] = false wo["FollowGrid"] = false wo["FollowMethod"] = FOLLOW_SCROLL
-- TILES -- if not wo["IsDifficult"] then ti["#"] = ti{"fl_bright"} .. ti{"st_invisible"} else ti["#"] = ti{"fl_bright"} .. ti{"st_death_invisible"} end
ti["+"] = ti{"fl_fake_abyss", checkerboard=0} .. ti{"fl_bright", checkerboard = 1} ti[" "] = {"fl_fake_abyss"} ti["x"] = {"fl_dark"} ti["-"] = {"fl_fake_abyss"} ti["X"] = {"it_meditation_hollow"} ti["o"] = ti{"fl_dark"} .. ti{"#ac_pearl_white"}
